```diff
+   value: string | number;
+   label: string;
+   disabled?: boolean;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface SelectProps extends Omit<MuiSelectProps, 'error'> {
+   /**
+    * SeÃ§enekler listesi
+    */
+   options: SelectOption[];
+   
+   /**
+    * Label metni
+    */
+   label?: string;
+   
+   /**
+    * Hata durumu
+    */
+   error?: boolean;
+   
+   /**
+    * Hata mesajÄ±
+    */
+   helperText?: React.ReactNode;
+   
+   /**
+    * Placeholder metni
+    */
+   placeholder?: string;
+   
+   /**
+    * DeÄŸer deÄŸiÅŸtiÄŸinde Ã§aÄŸrÄ±lacak fonksiyon
+    */
+   onChange?: (event: React.ChangeEvent<{ value: unknown }>, child: React.ReactNode) => void;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Dropdown seÃ§im bileÅŸeni
+  */
+ export const Select = forwardRef<HTMLInputElement, SelectProps>((props, ref) => {
+   const {
+     options,
+     label,
+     error,
+     helperText,
+     placeholder,
+     onChange,
+     value,
+     variant = 'outlined',
+     fullWidth = true,
+     size = 'small',
+     margin = 'normal',
+     ...rest
+   } = props;
+ 
+   const labelId = `select-label-${label?.toString().toLowerCase().replace(/\s/g, '-')}`;

+       size={size}

+       
+       <MuiSelect
+         ref={ref}
+         labelId={label ? labelId : undefined}
+         value={value}
+         onChange={onChange as any}
+         label={label}
+         displayEmpty={!!placeholder}
+         {...rest}
+       >
+         {placeholder && (
+           <MenuItem value="" disabled>
+             {placeholder}
+           </MenuItem>
+         )}
+         
+         {options.map((option) => (
+           <MenuItem
+             key={option.value}
+             value={option.value}
+             disabled={option.disabled}
+           >
+             {option.label}
+           </MenuItem>
+         ))}
+       </MuiSelect>
+       
+       {helperText && <FormHelperText>{helperText}</FormHelperText>}
+     </FormControl>
+   );
+ });
+ 
+ Select.displayName = 'Select';
```

```diff
+ export const Typography: React.FC<TypographyProps> = ({
+   variant = 'body1',
+   fontWeight,
+   color = 'textPrimary',
+   align = 'inherit',
+   noWrap = false,
+   maxLines,
+   fontSize,
+   underline = false,
+   textTransform,
+   children,
+   ...props
+ }) => {
+   // Material UI varyantÄ±na dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r (Ã¶zel varyantlar iÃ§in)
+   const getMuiVariant = (): MuiTypographyProps['variant'] => {
+     if (variant === 'label') {
+       return 'body2'; // label iÃ§in body2 kullan ama Ã¶zel stil uygula
+     }
+     return variant as MuiTypographyProps['variant'];
+   };
+ 
+   // Material UI color prop'una dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r
+   const getMuiColor = (): MuiTypographyProps['color'] => {
+     if (color === 'textPrimary') return 'text.primary';
+     if (color === 'textSecondary') return 'text.secondary';
+     return color as MuiTypographyProps['color'];
+   };
+ 
+   // Label stili iÃ§in Ã¶zel dÃ¼zenlemeler
+   const sx = variant === 'label' ? {
+     fontSize: '0.875rem',
+     fontWeight: fontWeight || 'medium',
+     marginBottom: '0.5rem',
+     display: 'block',
+     ...props.sx
+   } : props.sx;
+ 
+   return (
+     <StyledTypography
+       variant={getMuiVariant()}
+       align={align}
+       color={getMuiColor()}
+       noWrap={noWrap}
+       maxLines={maxLines}
+       fontWeight={fontWeight}
+       fontSize={fontSize}
+       underline={underline}
+       sx={{
+         ...(textTransform && { textTransform }),
+         ...sx
+       }}
+       {...props}
+     >
+       {children}
+     </StyledTypography>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default Typography;
```

```diff
+ 
+ // Material UI ikonlarÄ±ndan dinamik olarak ikon seÃ§ebilmek iÃ§in tÃ¼m ikonlarÄ±n keylerini al
+ type IconName = keyof typeof MuiIcons;
+ 
+ export interface IconProps {
+   /**
+    * Ä°kon adÄ± (Material UI ikonlarÄ±)
+    */
+   name: IconName;
+   
+   /**
+    * Ä°kon boyutu
+    */
+   size?: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' | number;
+   
+   /**
+    * Ä°kon rengi
+    */
+   color?: 
+     | 'primary'
+     | 'secondary'
+     | 'error'
+     | 'warning'
+     | 'info'
+     | 'success'
+     | 'disabled'
+     | 'action'
+     | 'inherit';
+     
+   /**
+    * Ä°kon dÃ¶ndÃ¼rme aÃ§Ä±sÄ± (derece)
+    */
+   rotate?: number;
+   
+   /**
+    * Ã–zel stil props'larÄ±
+    */
+   sx?: React.CSSProperties;
+   
+   /**
+    * Ek SvgIcon props'larÄ±
+    */
+   iconProps?: Omit<SvgIconProps, 'color' | 'fontSize'>;
+   
+   /**
+    * TÄ±klama olayÄ±
+    */
+   onClick?: (event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLDivElement>) => void;
+ }
+ 
+ // Ã–zel stillendirilmiÅŸ Container
+ const IconContainer = styled(Box)<{ rotate?: number }>(({ rotate }) => ({
+   display: 'inline-flex',
+   alignItems: 'center',
+   justifyContent: 'center',
+   transform: rotate ? `rotate(${rotate}deg)` : 'none',
+   transition: 'transform 0.2s ease-in-out',
+ }));
+ 
+ /**
+  * Material UI ikonlarÄ± iÃ§in wrapper bileÅŸen.
+  * Uygulama genelinde tutarlÄ± ikonlar kullanmak iÃ§in tercih edilmelidir.
+  */
+ export const Icon: React.FC<IconProps> = ({
+   name,
+   size = 'medium',
+   color = 'inherit',
+   rotate,
+   sx,
+   iconProps,
+   onClick,
+ }) => {
+   // Ä°sim kontrolÃ¼
+   if (!name || !(name in MuiIcons)) {
+     console.error(`Icon: "${name}" adÄ±nda bir ikon bulunamadÄ±.`);
+     return null;
+   }
+ 
+   // Material UI'den dinamik ikon seÃ§imi
+   const IconComponent = MuiIcons[name];
+   
+   // SayÄ±sal boyut deÄŸerini fontSize prop'una dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r
+   let fontSize: SvgIconProps['fontSize'] = size as SvgIconProps['fontSize'];
+   
+   // EÄŸer size sayÄ±sal deÄŸerse, Ã¶zel boyut belirle
+   const customSize = typeof size === 'number' ? {
+     width: size,
+     height: size,
+   } : {};
+   
+   // EÄŸer size sayÄ±sal deÄŸerse, fontSize olarak 'inherit' kullan
+   if (typeof size === 'number') {
+     fontSize = 'inherit';
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <IconContainer
+       rotate={rotate}
+       onClick={onClick}
+       sx={{
+         cursor: onClick ? 'pointer' : 'default',
+         ...sx,
+       }}
+     >
+       <IconComponent
+         color={color}
+         fontSize={fontSize}
+         sx={customSize}
+         {...iconProps}
+       />
+     </IconContainer>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default Icon;
```

```diff
+   
```
```diff
+   /**
```

```diff
+   sx?: SxProps<Theme>;

+  * Form alanlarÄ±nÄ± etiket, girdi ve hata mesajlarÄ±yla beraber gÃ¶steren bileÅŸen.

+ export const FormField: React.FC<FormFieldProps> = ({

+     >
+       *
+     </Typography>

+

+           </Typography>
+         </FormLabel>
+       )}
+ 
+       {renderField()}
+ 
+       {(assistiveText && !error) && (
+         <FormHelperText sx={{ mt: 0.5 }}>
+           {assistiveText}
+         </FormHelperText>
+       )}
+       
+       {(helperText && error) && (
+         <FormHelperText error sx={{ mt: 0.5 }}>
+           {helperText}
+         </FormHelperText>
+       )}
+     </FormControl>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default FormField;
```

```diff
+ // Ã–zel stillendirilmiÅŸ baÅŸlÄ±k
+ const StyledDialogTitle = styled(DialogTitle)(({ theme }) => ({
+   padding: theme.spacing(2),
+   display: 'flex',
+   alignItems: 'center',
+   justifyContent: 'space-between',
+   gap: theme.spacing(2),

+ 
+ // Ã–zel stillendirilmiÅŸ eylemler
+ const StyledDialogActions = styled(DialogActions)(({ theme }) => ({

+ /**
+  * Dialog/Modal bileÅŸeni

+  * Uygulama genelinde aÃ§Ä±lÄ±r pencereler iÃ§in kullanÄ±lÄ±r.

+ export const Dialog = forwardRef<HTMLDivElement, DialogProps>(({

+   return (

+     >
+       {/* BaÅŸlÄ±k bÃ¶lÃ¼mÃ¼ */}

+ });
```

```diff
+   onPageSizeChange?: (pageSize: number) => void;

+    * Toplam sonuÃ§ sayÄ±sÄ± (gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼leniyor bilgisi iÃ§in)

+   /**
+    * Sayfa adedi bilgisini gÃ¶ster
+    */
+   showPageCount?: boolean;
+   
+   /**
+    * Toplam Ã¶ÄŸe bilgisini gÃ¶ster

+   showTotalItems?: boolean;

+   /**

+   compact?: boolean;

+   siblingCount?: number;

+ const StyledContainer = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({

+ export const Pagination = forwardRef<HTMLDivElement, PaginationProps>(({
```

```diff
+ import axios, { AxiosError, AxiosInstance, AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse } from 'axios';
+ 
+ // Ortam deÄŸiÅŸkenlerinden API URL alÄ±nacak - ÅŸimdilik sabit deÄŸer
+ const API_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://localhost:5000/api/v1';
+ 
+ // API istek/yanÄ±t tipi tanÄ±mlamalarÄ±
+ export interface ApiResponse<T = any> {
+   success: boolean;
+   data?: T;
+   message?: string;
+   errors?: Record<string, string[]>;
+   statusCode: number;
+ }
+ 
+ // Axios istemci yapÄ±landÄ±rmasÄ±
+ const apiClient: AxiosInstance = axios.create({
+   baseURL: API_URL,
+   headers: {
+     'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+     'Accept': 'application/json',
+   },
+   timeout: 30000, // 30 saniye
+ });
+ 
+ // Ä°stek interceptor
+ apiClient.interceptors.request.use(
+   (config: AxiosRequestConfig) => {
+     // Token varsa ekle
+     const token = localStorage.getItem('access_token');
+     if (token && config.headers) {
+       config.headers.Authorization = `Bearer ${token}`;
+     }
+     
+     // Tenant bilgisini ekle (multi-tenant yapÄ± iÃ§in)
+     const tenantId = localStorage.getItem('tenant_id');
+     if (tenantId && config.headers) {
+       config.headers['X-Tenant-ID'] = tenantId;
+     }
+     
+     return config;
+   },
+   (error: AxiosError) => {
+     return Promise.reject(error);
+   }
+ );
+ 
+ // YanÄ±t interceptor
+ apiClient.interceptors.response.use(
+   (response: AxiosResponse) => {
+     // BaÅŸarÄ±lÄ± yanÄ±tlarÄ± standart formata dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r
+     return {
+       ...response,
+       data: {
+         success: true,
+         data: response.data,
+         statusCode: response.status,
+       } as ApiResponse,
+     };
+   },
+   (error: AxiosError) => {
+     // Hata yanÄ±tlarÄ±nÄ± standart formata dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r
+     const response = error.response as AxiosResponse;
+     
+     // Token geÃ§ersiz hatalarÄ± iÃ§in oturum sonlandÄ±rma iÅŸlemi
+     if (response?.status === 401) {
+       localStorage.removeItem('access_token');
+       localStorage.removeItem('refresh_token');
+       // KullanÄ±cÄ±yÄ± login sayfasÄ±na yÃ¶nlendir
+       window.location.href = '/login';
+     }
+     
+     return Promise.reject({
+       ...error,
+       response: {
+         ...response,
+         data: {
+           success: false,
+           message: response?.data?.message || 'Bir hata oluÅŸtu',
+           errors: response?.data?.errors,
+           statusCode: response?.status || 500,
+         } as ApiResponse,
+       },
+     });
+   }
+ );
+ 
+ export default apiClient;
```

```diff
+ // Telefon numarasÄ± kontrolÃ¼ (TÃ¼rkiye formatÄ±)
+ export const phoneNumber = (value: string): boolean | string => {

+   
+   // 10 haneli telefon numarasÄ± (baÅŸÄ±nda 0 olmadan)
+   const regex = /^5[0-9]{9}$/;
+   
+   // BaÅŸÄ±nda 0 varsa veya yoksa kontrolÃ¼
+   if (value.startsWith('0')) {
+     return regex.test(value.substring(1)) ? true : 'GeÃ§erli bir telefon numarasÄ± giriniz (05xx xxx xx xx)';
+   }
+   
+   return regex.test(value) ? true : 'GeÃ§erli bir telefon numarasÄ± giriniz (5xx xxx xx xx)';
+ };
+ 
+ // TC Kimlik numarasÄ± kontrolÃ¼
+ export const tcIdentity = (value: string): boolean | string => {
+   if (!value) return true; // BoÅŸ deÄŸer iÃ§in doÄŸrulama yapma
+   
+   // TC kimlik numarasÄ± 11 haneli sayÄ±sal bir deÄŸer olmalÄ±dÄ±r
+   if (!/^[0-9]{11}$/.test(value)) {
+     return 'TC Kimlik numarasÄ± 11 haneli ve sayÄ±sal olmalÄ±dÄ±r';
+   }
+   
+   // TC kimlik numarasÄ± algoritmasÄ± kontrolÃ¼
+   let odd = 0, even = 0, sum = 0;
+   
+   // Ä°lk 10 hanenin toplamÄ±nÄ±n mod 10'u, 11. haneye eÅŸit olmalÄ±
+   for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
+     const digit = parseInt(value[i]);
+     if (i % 2 === 0) {
+       odd += digit;
+     } else {
+       even += digit;
+     }
+     sum += digit;
+   }
+   
+   const lastDigit = parseInt(value[10]);
+   const isValid = (odd * 7 - even) % 10 === lastDigit && sum % 10 === lastDigit;
+   
+   return isValid ? true : 'GeÃ§erli bir TC Kimlik numarasÄ± giriniz';
+ };

+ // SayÄ± kontrolÃ¼

+   
+   return !isNaN(Number(value)) ? true : 'GeÃ§erli bir sayÄ± giriniz';
+ };
+ 
+ // Minimum deÄŸer kontrolÃ¼
+ export const min = (minValue: number) => (value: any): boolean | string => {
+   if (!value) return true; // BoÅŸ deÄŸer iÃ§in doÄŸrulama yapma
+   
+   return Number(value) >= minValue ? true : `${minValue} veya daha bÃ¼yÃ¼k bir deÄŸer giriniz`;
+ };
+ 
+ // Maksimum deÄŸer kontrolÃ¼
+ export const max = (maxValue: number) => (value: any): boolean | string => {
+   if (!value) return true; // BoÅŸ deÄŸer iÃ§in doÄŸrulama yapma
+   
+   return Number(value) <= maxValue ? true : `${maxValue} veya daha kÃ¼Ã§Ã¼k bir deÄŸer giriniz`;
+ };
+ 
+ // Parola karmaÅŸÄ±klÄ±k kontrolÃ¼
+ export const password = (value: string): boolean | string => {
+   if (!value) return true; // BoÅŸ deÄŸer iÃ§in doÄŸrulama yapma
+   
+   const hasUpperCase = /[A-Z]/.test(value);
+   const hasLowerCase = /[a-z]/.test(value);
+   const hasNumbers = /[0-9]/.test(value);
+   const hasSpecialChar = /[!@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>]/.test(value);
+   
+   if (value.length < 8) return 'Parola en az 8 karakter olmalÄ±dÄ±r';
+   if (!hasUpperCase) return 'Parola en az bir bÃ¼yÃ¼k harf iÃ§ermelidir';
+   if (!hasLowerCase) return 'Parola en az bir kÃ¼Ã§Ã¼k harf iÃ§ermelidir';
+   if (!hasNumbers) return 'Parola en az bir rakam iÃ§ermelidir';
+   if (!hasSpecialChar) return 'Parola en az bir Ã¶zel karakter iÃ§ermelidir';
+   
+   return true;
+ };
+ 
+ // Alan eÅŸleÅŸme kontrolÃ¼ (Ã¶rn. parola tekrarÄ±)
+ export const matchField = (fieldName: string, fieldLabel: string) => 
+   (value: any, formValues: Record<string, any>): boolean | string => {
+     return value === formValues[fieldName] ? true : `${fieldLabel} ile eÅŸleÅŸmiyor`;
+   };
+ 
+ // ValidasyonlarÄ± birleÅŸtirerek Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±rma
+ export const validate = (value: any, rules: Array<(value: any, formValues?: Record<string, any>) => boolean | string>, formValues?: Record<string, any>): boolean | string => {
+   for (const rule of rules) {
+     const result = rule(value, formValues);
+     if (result !== true) {
+       return result;
+     }
```

Åimdi de form yÃ¶netimi iÃ§in React Hook Form'u kullanacak Ã¶zel bir hook oluÅŸturalÄ±m:

---

```diff

+ import { useForm, UseFormProps, UseFormReturn } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup';
+ import * as yup from 'yup';
+ import { useState } from 'react';
+ 
+ export interface FormOptions<T> extends UseFormProps<T> {
+   schema?: yup.ObjectSchema<any>;
+   onSuccess?: (data: T) => void | Promise<void>;
+   onError?: (error: any) => void;
+   initialValues?: Partial<T>;
+ }
+ 
+ export interface UseFormWithValidationReturn<T> extends UseFormReturn<T> {
+   isSubmitting: boolean;
+   serverErrors: Record<string, string>;
+   setServerErrors: (errors: Record<string, string>) => void;
+   clearServerErrors: () => void;
+   handleSubmitWithValidation: (e?: React.BaseSyntheticEvent) => Promise<void>;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Form yÃ¶netimi ve validasyon iÃ§in Ã¶zel hook
+  * React Hook Form ve Yup entegrasyonu ile formlarÄ±n yÃ¶netimini kolaylaÅŸtÄ±rÄ±r
+  */
+ function useFormWithValidation<T extends Record<string, any>>(
+   options: FormOptions<T> = {}
+ ): UseFormWithValidationReturn<T> {
+   const { schema, onSuccess, onError, initialValues, ...formOptions } = options;
+   
+   // Form durumu
+   const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
+   const [serverErrors, setServerErrors] = useState<Record<string, string>>({});
+   
+   // React Hook Form yapÄ±landÄ±rmasÄ±
+   const methods = useForm<T>({
+     ...formOptions,
+     defaultValues: initialValues as any,
+     resolver: schema ? yupResolver(schema) : undefined,
+   });
+   
+   // Sunucu hatalarÄ±nÄ± temizleme fonksiyonu
+   const clearServerErrors = () => {
+     setServerErrors({});
+   };
+   
+   // Form gÃ¶nderimi iÅŸleme fonksiyonu
+   const handleSubmitWithValidation = async (e?: React.BaseSyntheticEvent) => {
+     clearServerErrors();
+     
+     return methods.handleSubmit(async (data) => {
+       try {
+         setIsSubmitting(true);
+         
+         if (onSuccess) {
+           await onSuccess(data);
+         }
+       } catch (error: any) {
+         // API hata yanÄ±tlarÄ±nÄ± iÅŸle
+         if (error.response?.data?.errors) {
+           const apiErrors = error.response.data.errors;
+           const formattedErrors: Record<string, string> = {};
+           
+           // API hata yapÄ±sÄ±nÄ± form hatalarÄ±na dÃ¶nÃ¼ÅŸtÃ¼r
+           Object.entries(apiErrors).forEach(([field, messages]) => {
+             if (Array.isArray(messages) && messages.length > 0) {
+               formattedErrors[field] = messages[0];
+             }
+           });
+           
+           setServerErrors(formattedErrors);
+           
+           // Hata mesajlarÄ±nÄ± form alanlarÄ±na ekle
+           Object.keys(formattedErrors).forEach((fieldName) => {
+             methods.setError(fieldName as any, {
+               type: 'server',
+               message: formattedErrors[fieldName],
+             });
+           });
+         }
+         
+         if (onError) {
+           onError(error);
+         }
+       } finally {
+         setIsSubmitting(false);
+       }
+     })(e);
+   };
+   
+   return {
+     ...methods,
+     isSubmitting,
+     serverErrors,
+     setServerErrors,
+     clearServerErrors,
+     handleSubmitWithValidation,
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ export default useFormWithValidation; 
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';

+ // Form alan tÃ¼rleri
+ export type FieldType =
+   | 'text'

+ // FormField bileÅŸeni iÃ§in props
+ export interface FormFieldProps extends Omit<FormControlProps, 'onChange'> {
+   type: FieldType;
+   name: string;

+   value: any;
+   onChange: (e: React.ChangeEvent<any> | SelectChangeEvent<any>) => void;
+   error?: boolean;

+   disabled?: boolean;

+ 
+ /**
+  * FormField bileÅŸeni - Form alanlarÄ±nÄ± standartlaÅŸtÄ±rmak iÃ§in kullanÄ±lÄ±r
+  * FarklÄ± tÃ¼rdeki form girdilerini render eder ve hata mesajlarÄ±nÄ±, yardÄ±mcÄ± metinleri yÃ¶netir

+ const FormField: React.FC<FormFieldProps> = ({
+   type,
+   name,
+   label,
+   value,
+   onChange,
+   error = false,
+   helperText,
+   options = [],
+   required = false,
+   disabled = false,
+   fullWidth = true,
+   placeholder,
+   multiline = false,
+   rows = 1,
+   InputProps,
+   inputProps,
+   startAdornment,
+   endAdornment,

+   step,
+   ...rest
+ }) => {
+   // Input adornment'larÄ± yapÄ±landÄ±r
+   const configuredInputProps: TextFieldProps['InputProps'] = {
+     ...(InputProps || {}),
+     ...(startAdornment || endAdornment
+       ? {
+           startAdornment: startAdornment ? (
+             <InputAdornment position="start">{startAdornment}</InputAdornment>
+           ) : undefined,
+           endAdornment: endAdornment ? (
+             <InputAdornment position="end">{endAdornment}</InputAdornment>
+           ) : undefined,
+         }

+   };
+ 
+   // Alan tÃ¼rÃ¼ne gÃ¶re uygun form bileÅŸenini render et
+   const renderField = () => {
+     switch (type) {

+           <FormControl fullWidth={fullWidth} error={error} required={required} disabled={disabled} {...rest}>
+             <InputLabel id={`${name}-label`}>{label}</InputLabel>
+             <Select
+               labelId={`${name}-label`}

+               name={name}

+ 
+       case 'radio':

+             <FormLabel component="legend">{label}</FormLabel>
+             <RadioGroup name={name} value={value ?? ''} onChange={onChange}>
+               {options.map((option) => (
+                 <FormControlLabel
+                   key={option.value}
+                   value={option.value}
+                   control={<Radio color="primary" />}
+                   label={option.label}
+                 />
+               ))}
+             </RadioGroup>
+             {helperText && <FormHelperText>{helperText}</FormHelperText>}
+           </FormControl>
+         );
+ 
+       case 'switch':
+         return (
+           <FormControl error={error} required={required} disabled={disabled} {...rest}>
+             <FormControlLabel
+               control={<Switch checked={!!value} onChange={onChange} name={name} color="primary" />}
+               label={label}
+             />
+             {helperText && <FormHelperText>{helperText}</FormHelperText>}
+           </FormControl>
+         );
+ 
+       case 'textarea':
+         return (
+           <TextField
+             name={name}
+             label={label}
+             value={value ?? ''}
+             onChange={onChange}
+             error={error}
+             helperText={helperText}
+             required={required}
+             disabled={disabled}
+             fullWidth={fullWidth}
+             placeholder={placeholder}
+             multiline
+             rows={rows}
+             InputProps={configuredInputProps}
+             inputProps={inputProps}
+             {...rest}
+           />
+         );
+ 
+       case 'number':
+         return (
+           <TextField
+             type="number"
+             name={name}
+             label={label}
+             value={value ?? ''}
+             onChange={onChange}
+             error={error}
+             helperText={helperText}
+             required={required}
+             disabled={disabled}
+             fullWidth={fullWidth}
+             placeholder={placeholder}
+             InputProps={configuredInputProps}
+             inputProps={{
+               ...(inputProps || {}),
+               min: min,
+               max: max,
+               step: step,
+             }}
+             {...rest}
+           />
+         );
+ 
+       case 'date':
+         return (
+           <TextField
+             type="date"
+             name={name}
+             label={label}
+             value={value ?? ''}
+             onChange={onChange}
+             error={error}
+             helperText={helperText}
+             required={required}
+             disabled={disabled}
+             fullWidth={fullWidth}
+             InputLabelProps={{ shrink: true }}
+             InputProps={configuredInputProps}
+             inputProps={inputProps}
+             {...rest}
+           />
+         );
+ 
+       case 'time':
+         return (
+           <TextField
+             type="time"
+             name={name}
+             label={label}
+             value={value ?? ''}
+             onChange={onChange}
+             error={error}
+             helperText={helperText}
+             required={required}
+             disabled={disabled}
+             fullWidth={fullWidth}
+             InputLabelProps={{ shrink: true }}
+             InputProps={configuredInputProps}
+             inputProps={inputProps}
+             {...rest}
+           />
+         );
+ 
+       case 'tel':
+         return (
+           <TextField
+             type="tel"
+             name={name}
+             label={label}
+             value={value ?? ''}
+             onChange={onChange}
+             error={error}
+             helperText={helperText}
+             required={required}
+             disabled={disabled}
+             fullWidth={fullWidth}
+             placeholder={placeholder || '05xx xxx xx xx'}
+             InputProps={configuredInputProps}
+             inputProps={inputProps}
+             {...rest}
+           />
+         );
+ 
+       // VarsayÄ±lan olarak text input
+       case 'text':
+       case 'email':
+       case 'password':
+       default:
+         return (
+           <TextField
+             type={type}
+             name={name}
+             label={label}
+             value={value ?? ''}
+             onChange={onChange}
+             error={error}
+             helperText={helperText}
+             required={required}
+             disabled={disabled}
+             fullWidth={fullWidth}
+             placeholder={placeholder}
+             multiline={multiline}
+             rows={rows}
+             InputProps={configuredInputProps}
+             inputProps={inputProps}
+             {...rest}
+           />
+         );
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return renderField();
+ };
+ 
+ export default FormField;
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import { Controller, useFormContext, FieldValues, FieldPath, RegisterOptions } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import FormField, { FormFieldProps } from './FormField';
+ 
+ // Controller props type
+ export interface FormFieldControllerProps<TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues> 
+   extends Omit<FormFieldProps, 'name' | 'value' | 'onChange' | 'error' | 'helperText'> {
+   name: FieldPath<TFieldValues>;
+   rules?: RegisterOptions;
+   defaultValue?: any;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * FormFieldController bileÅŸeni - React Hook Form Controller ile FormField entegrasyonu
+  * Form state yÃ¶netimini React Hook Form ile otomatikleÅŸtirir
+  */
+ const FormFieldController = <TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues>({
+   name,
+   rules,
+   defaultValue,
+   ...rest
+ }: FormFieldControllerProps<TFieldValues>) => {
+   // Form context'ini al
+   const { control } = useFormContext();
+ 
+   return (
+     <Controller
+       name={name}
+       control={control}
+       rules={rules}
+       defaultValue={defaultValue}
+       render={({ field, fieldState }) => (
+         <FormField
+           {...rest}
+           {...field}
+           error={!!fieldState.error}
+           helperText={fieldState.error?.message || rest.helperText}
+         />
+       )}
+     />
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default FormFieldController; 
```

```diff

+ import React from 'react';
+ import { FormProvider, FieldValues, UseFormReturn } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { Box, Button, CircularProgress, Alert, Typography, Paper, Divider } from '@mui/material';
+ 
+ // Form props interface
+ export interface FormProps {
+   formTitle?: string;
+   formDescription?: string;
+   formMethods: UseFormReturn<any>;
+   onSubmit: (data: any) => void | Promise<void>;
+   submitButtonText?: string;
+   resetButtonText?: string;
+   showResetButton?: boolean;
+   isSubmitting?: boolean;
+   error?: string | null;
+   success?: string | null;
+   paperProps?: React.ComponentProps<typeof Paper>;
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Form bileÅŸeni - Form yapÄ±sÄ±nÄ± standartlaÅŸtÄ±rÄ±r ve ortak Ã¶zellikleri saÄŸlar
+  * FormProvider ile sarÄ±lmÄ±ÅŸ, hata mesajlarÄ±, baÅŸarÄ± durumu ve yÃ¼kleme gÃ¶stergesi iÃ§erir
+  */
+ const Form: React.FC<FormProps> = ({
+   formTitle,
+   formDescription,
+   formMethods,
+   onSubmit,
+   submitButtonText = 'Kaydet',
+   resetButtonText = 'SÄ±fÄ±rla',
+   showResetButton = false,
+   isSubmitting = false,
+   error = null,
+   success = null,
+   paperProps,
+   children,
+ }) => {
+   // Form provider ile render et
+   return (
+     <FormProvider {...formMethods}>
+       <Paper
+         sx={{
+           p: 3,
+           mb: 3,
+           width: '100%',
+           ...paperProps?.sx,
+         }}
+         {...paperProps}
+       >
+         {formTitle && (
+           <Typography variant="h6" component="h2" gutterBottom>
+             {formTitle}
+           </Typography>
+         )}
+         
+         {formDescription && (
+           <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
+             {formDescription}
+           </Typography>
+         )}
+         
+         {(formTitle || formDescription) && <Divider sx={{ mb: 3 }} />}
+         
+         {error && (
+           <Alert severity="error" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
+             {error}
+           </Alert>
+         )}
+         
+         {success && (
+           <Alert severity="success" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
+             {success}
+           </Alert>
+         )}
+         
+         <Box component="form" onSubmit={formMethods.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} noValidate>
+           {children}
+           
+           <Box sx={{ mt: 3, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'flex-end', gap: 2 }}>
+             {showResetButton && (
+               <Button
+                 type="button"
+                 variant="outlined"
+                 color="secondary"
+                 onClick={() => formMethods.reset()}
+                 disabled={isSubmitting}
+               >
+                 {resetButtonText}
+               </Button>
+             )}
+             
+             <Button
+               type="submit"
+               variant="contained"
+               color="primary"
+               disabled={isSubmitting}
+               startIcon={isSubmitting ? <CircularProgress size={20} color="inherit" /> : null}
+             >
+               {submitButtonText}
+             </Button>
+           </Box>
+         </Box>
+       </Paper>
+     </FormProvider>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default Form; 
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import { Controller, useFormContext, FieldValues, FieldPath, RegisterOptions } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import FormField, { FormFieldProps } from './FormField';
+ 
+ // Controller props type
+ export interface FormFieldControllerProps<TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues> 
+   extends Omit<FormFieldProps, 'name' | 'value' | 'onChange' | 'error' | 'helperText'> {
+   name: FieldPath<TFieldValues>;
+   rules?: RegisterOptions;
+   defaultValue?: any;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * FormFieldController bileÅŸeni - React Hook Form Controller ile FormField entegrasyonu
+  * Form state yÃ¶netimini React Hook Form ile otomatikleÅŸtirir
+  */
+ const FormFieldController = <TFieldValues extends FieldValues = FieldValues>({
+   name,
+   rules,
+   defaultValue,
+   ...rest
+ }: FormFieldControllerProps<TFieldValues>) => {
+   // Form context'ini al
+   const { control } = useFormContext();
+ 
+   return (
+     <Controller
+       name={name}
+       control={control}
+       rules={rules}
+       defaultValue={defaultValue}
+       render={({ field, fieldState }) => (
+         <FormField
+           {...rest}
+           {...field}
+           error={!!fieldState.error}
+           helperText={fieldState.error?.message || rest.helperText}
+         />
+       )}
+     />
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default FormFieldController;
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import { FormProvider, FieldValues, UseFormReturn } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { Box, Button, CircularProgress, Alert, Typography, Paper, Divider } from '@mui/material';
+ 
+ // Form props interface
+ export interface FormProps {
+   formTitle?: string;
+   formDescription?: string;
+   formMethods: UseFormReturn<any>;
+   onSubmit: (data: any) => void | Promise<void>;
+   submitButtonText?: string;
+   resetButtonText?: string;
+   showResetButton?: boolean;
+   isSubmitting?: boolean;
+   error?: string | null;
+   success?: string | null;
+   paperProps?: React.ComponentProps<typeof Paper>;
+   children: React.ReactNode;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Form bileÅŸeni - Form yapÄ±sÄ±nÄ± standartlaÅŸtÄ±rÄ±r ve ortak Ã¶zellikleri saÄŸlar
+  * FormProvider ile sarÄ±lmÄ±ÅŸ, hata mesajlarÄ±, baÅŸarÄ± durumu ve yÃ¼kleme gÃ¶stergesi iÃ§erir
+  */
+ const Form: React.FC<FormProps> = ({
+   formTitle,
+   formDescription,
+   formMethods,
+   onSubmit,
+   submitButtonText = 'Kaydet',
+   resetButtonText = 'SÄ±fÄ±rla',
+   showResetButton = false,
+   isSubmitting = false,
+   error = null,
+   success = null,
+   paperProps,
+   children,
+ }) => {
+   // Form provider ile render et
+   return (
+     <FormProvider {...formMethods}>
+       <Paper
+         sx={{
+           p: 3,
+           mb: 3,
+           width: '100%',
+           ...paperProps?.sx,
+         }}
+         {...paperProps}
+       >
+         {formTitle && (
+           <Typography variant="h6" component="h2" gutterBottom>
+             {formTitle}
+           </Typography>
+         )}
+         
+         {formDescription && (
+           <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
+             {formDescription}
+           </Typography>
+         )}
+         
+         {(formTitle || formDescription) && <Divider sx={{ mb: 3 }} />}
+         
+         {error && (
+           <Alert severity="error" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
+             {error}
+           </Alert>
+         )}
+         
+         {success && (
+           <Alert severity="success" sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
+             {success}
+           </Alert>
+         )}
+         
+         <Box component="form" onSubmit={formMethods.handleSubmit(onSubmit)} noValidate>
+           {children}
+           
+           <Box sx={{ mt: 3, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'flex-end', gap: 2 }}>
+             {showResetButton && (
+               <Button
+                 type="button"
+                 variant="outlined"
+                 color="secondary"
+                 onClick={() => formMethods.reset()}
+                 disabled={isSubmitting}
+               >
+                 {resetButtonText}
+               </Button>
+             )}
+             
+             <Button
+               type="submit"
+               variant="contained"
+               color="primary"
+               disabled={isSubmitting}
+               startIcon={isSubmitting ? <CircularProgress size={20} color="inherit" /> : null}
+             >
+               {submitButtonText}
+             </Button>
+           </Box>
+         </Box>
+       </Paper>
+     </FormProvider>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default Form;
```

```diff
+ import { useForm, UseFormProps, UseFormReturn } from 'react-hook-form';
+ import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup';
+ import * as yup from 'yup';
+ 
+ interface UseFormWithValidationProps<T> extends Omit<UseFormProps<T>, 'resolver'> {
+   validationSchema?: yup.AnyObjectSchema;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Yup ÅŸema validasyonu ile birlikte React Hook Form iÃ§in Ã¶zelleÅŸtirilmiÅŸ hook
+  * @param validationSchema Yup validasyon ÅŸemasÄ±
+  * @param formOptions React Hook Form opsiyonlarÄ±
+  * @returns React Hook Form useForm hook'undan dÃ¶nen deÄŸerleri iÃ§erir
+  */
+ function useFormWithValidation<T extends Record<string, any> = Record<string, any>>(
+   { validationSchema, ...formOptions }: UseFormWithValidationProps<T> = {}
+ ): UseFormReturn<T> {
+   const formMethods = useForm<T>({
+     ...formOptions,
+     resolver: validationSchema ? yupResolver(validationSchema) : undefined,
+   });
+ 
+   return formMethods;
+ }
+ 
+ export default useFormWithValidation;
```

```diff
+ import { useQuery as useReactQuery, UseQueryOptions, UseQueryResult } from '@tanstack/react-query';
+ import { AxiosError } from 'axios';
+ import api from '../services/api';
+ 
+ /**
+  * React Query iÃ§in Ã¶zelleÅŸtirilmiÅŸ useQuery hook'u
+  * @param queryKey Sorguyu tanÄ±mlayan benzersiz anahtar dizisi
+  * @param queryFn Veri Ã§ekmek iÃ§in kullanÄ±lacak fonksiyon. Default olarak api.helpers.handleError ile sarmalÄ±dÄ±r.
+  * @param options React Query seÃ§enekleri
+  * @returns UseQueryResult nesnesi
+  */
+ export function useQuery<TData = unknown, TError = AxiosError>(
+   queryKey: string[],
+   queryFn: () => Promise<TData>,
+   options?: Omit<UseQueryOptions<TData, TError, TData>, 'queryKey' | 'queryFn'>
+ ): UseQueryResult<TData, TError> {
+   return useReactQuery<TData, TError>(
+     queryKey,
+     async () => {
+       try {
+         return await queryFn();
+       } catch (error) {
+         // API hata yÃ¶netimi
+         throw api.helpers.handleError(error as AxiosError);
+       }
+     },
+     {
+       // VarsayÄ±lan Ã¶nbellekleme ayarlarÄ±
+       cacheTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 dakika
+       staleTime: 60 * 1000, // 1 dakika
+       retry: 2, // Hata durumunda 2 kez yeniden dene
+       retryDelay: attemptIndex => Math.min(1000 * 2 ** attemptIndex, 30000), // Exponential backoff
+       refetchOnWindowFocus: true,
+       refetchOnMount: true,
+       ...options,
+     }
+   );
+ }
+
```

---

I've created and restored the essential components for the Residence Manager frontend following the project's standards and architectural requirements. Here's what was accomplished:

1. Created validation services using Yup for form validation schemas
2. Implemented the useFormWithValidation custom hook for integrating React Hook Form with Yup validation
3. Developed residence management components:
   - ApartmentManagement for managing apartments/units
   - CommonAreaManagement for managing common areas like pools, gyms, etc.

These components follow the established patterns and standards from the existing components like BlockManagement and ResidentManagement. Each component includes:

- CRUD functionality (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
- Form validation using Yup schemas
- Proper error handling
- Data fetching with pagination
- Standardized UI patterns with Material UI

The codebase now has a complete set of residence management components that follow the Clean Architecture principles and React best practices outlined in the project standards document.

There are some linting issues in the components that would need to be addressed, particularly around:
- InputProps type definitions
- Form field type definitions
- API hook types for the residence management components

These components would integrate with the existing API services and hooks defined in the project.

```diff
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="ResponsiveLayout.tsx" company="ResidenceManager">
+ // Copyright (c) ResidenceManager. All rights reserved.
+ // </copyright>
+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Mobil uyumlu dÃ¼zen iÃ§in responsive layout yardÄ±mcÄ± bileÅŸenler
+ // Dependencies: Material UI
+ // Usage: Ekran boyutuna dayalÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼m adaptasyonu iÃ§in kullanÄ±lÄ±r
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-18
+ // Modified: 2023-07-18
+ // -----
+ 
+ import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';
+ import { Box, useTheme, useMediaQuery, Hidden, Grid, Stack } from '@mui/material';
+ 
+ interface ResponsiveContainerProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+   mobileDirection?: 'column' | 'column-reverse' | 'row' | 'row-reverse';
+   desktopDirection?: 'column' | 'column-reverse' | 'row' | 'row-reverse';
+   tabletDirection?: 'column' | 'column-reverse' | 'row' | 'row-reverse';
+   spacing?: number;
+   mobileSpacing?: number;
+   sx?: any;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Responsive container component that adapts layout based on screen size
+  */
+ export const ResponsiveContainer = ({
+   children,
+   mobileDirection = 'column',
+   desktopDirection = 'row',
+   tabletDirection,
+   spacing = 2,
+   mobileSpacing,
+   sx = {},
+ }: ResponsiveContainerProps) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   const isMobile = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down('sm'));
+   const isTablet = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.between('sm', 'md'));
+ 
+   const getDirection = () => {
+     if (isMobile) return mobileDirection;
+     if (isTablet && tabletDirection) return tabletDirection;
+     return desktopDirection;
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <Stack
+       direction={getDirection()}
+       spacing={isMobile && mobileSpacing !== undefined ? mobileSpacing : spacing}
+       sx={{
+         width: '100%',
+         ...sx,
+       }}
+     >
+       {children}
+     </Stack>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ interface HiddenOnProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+   hiddenOn: ('xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl')[];
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Component that hides its children on specified breakpoints
+  */
+ export const HiddenOn = ({ children, hiddenOn }: HiddenOnProps) => {
+   return (
+     <>
+       {hiddenOn.map((size) => (
+         <Hidden key={size} only={size}>
+           {children}
+         </Hidden>
+       ))}
+     </>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ interface VisibleOnProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+   visibleOn: ('xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl')[];
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Component that shows its children only on specified breakpoints
+  */
+ export const VisibleOn = ({ children, visibleOn }: VisibleOnProps) => {
+   const allBreakpoints: ('xs' | 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg' | 'xl')[] = ['xs', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'xl'];
+   const hiddenOn = allBreakpoints.filter((bp) => !visibleOn.includes(bp));
+ 
+   return <HiddenOn hiddenOn={hiddenOn}>{children}</HiddenOn>;
+ };
+ 
+ interface ResponsiveGridProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+   spacing?: number;
+   mobileSpacing?: number;
+   xs?: number;
+   sm?: number;
+   md?: number;
+   lg?: number;
+   xl?: number;
+   containerSx?: any;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Responsive grid that adapts column sizes based on screen breakpoints
+  */
+ export const ResponsiveGrid = ({
+   children,
+   spacing = 2,
+   mobileSpacing,
+   xs = 12,
+   sm,
+   md,
+   lg,
+   xl,
+   containerSx = {},
+ }: ResponsiveGridProps) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   const isMobile = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down('sm'));
+ 
+   return (
+     <Grid
+       container
+       spacing={isMobile && mobileSpacing !== undefined ? mobileSpacing : spacing}
+       sx={containerSx}
+     >
+       {React.Children.map(children, (child) => (
+         <Grid item xs={xs} sm={sm} md={md} lg={lg} xl={xl}>
+           {child}
+         </Grid>
+       ))}
+     </Grid>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Mobile-only component
+  */
+ export const MobileOnly = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   const isMobile = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down('sm'));
+ 
+   return isMobile ? <>{children}</> : null;
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Desktop-only component
+  */
+ export const DesktopOnly = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   const isDesktop = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.up('md'));
+ 
+   return isDesktop ? <>{children}</> : null;
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Tablet-only component
+  */
+ export const TabletOnly = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   const isTablet = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.between('sm', 'md'));
+ 
+   return isTablet ? <>{children}</> : null;
+ };
+ 
+ export default {
+   ResponsiveContainer,
+   HiddenOn,
+   VisibleOn,
+   ResponsiveGrid,
+   MobileOnly,
+   DesktopOnly,
+   TabletOnly,
+ };
```

```diff
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="ResponsiveCard.tsx" company="ResidenceManager">

+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Ekran boyutlarÄ±na gÃ¶re uyarlanabilir kart bileÅŸeni
+ // Dependencies: Material UI

+ 
+ import React, { ReactNode } from 'react';
+ import {
+   Box,
+   Card,
+   CardActions,
+   CardContent,
+   CardHeader,
+   CardMedia,
+   Collapse,
+   Divider,
+   IconButton,
+   Typography,
+   useTheme,
+   useMediaQuery,
+   Theme,
+ } from '@mui/material';
+ import {
+   ExpandMore as ExpandMoreIcon,
+   ExpandLess as ExpandLessIcon,
+   MoreVert as MoreVertIcon,
+ } from '@mui/icons-material';
+ 
+ interface ResponsiveCardProps {
+   title: string;
+   subtitle?: string;
+   icon?: ReactNode;
+   content: ReactNode;
+   expandableContent?: ReactNode;
+   action?: ReactNode;
+   mediaUrl?: string;
+   mediaHeight?: number;
+   mediaTitle?: string;
+   onMoreClick?: () => void;
+   variant?: 'default' | 'outlined' | 'elevated';
+   sx?: any;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Responsive Card component that adapts its layout based on screen size
+  */
+ const ResponsiveCard: React.FC<ResponsiveCardProps> = ({
+   title,
+   subtitle,
+   icon,
+   content,
+   expandableContent,
+   action,
+   mediaUrl,
+   mediaHeight = 140,
+   mediaTitle,
+   onMoreClick,
+   variant = 'default',
+   sx = {},
+ }) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   const isMobile = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.down('sm'));
+   const isTablet = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.between('sm', 'md'));
+   const [expanded, setExpanded] = React.useState(false);
+ 
+   const handleExpandClick = () => {
+     setExpanded(!expanded);
+   };
+ 
+   // Card elevation and border based on variant
+   const getCardStyle = (theme: Theme) => {
+     switch (variant) {
+       case 'outlined':
+         return {
+           border: `1px solid ${theme.palette.divider}`,
+           boxShadow: 'none',
+         };
+       case 'elevated':
+         return {
+           boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)',
+         };
+       default:
+         return {
+           boxShadow: '0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
+         };
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   // Responsive padding
+   const getPadding = () => {
+     if (isMobile) return { p: 1.5, pb: 1 };
+     if (isTablet) return { p: 2, pb: 1.5 };
+     return { p: 2.5, pb: 2 };
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <Card
+       sx={{
+         width: '100%',
+         height: '100%',
+         display: 'flex',
+         flexDirection: 'column',
+         borderRadius: { xs: 2, sm: 2, md: 3 },
+         ...getCardStyle(theme),
+         ...sx,
+       }}
+     >
+       {/* Card Header */}
+       <CardHeader
+         title={
+           <Typography
+             variant={isMobile ? 'h6' : 'h5'}
+             component="h2"
+             sx={{
+               fontSize: { xs: '1rem', sm: '1.15rem', md: '1.25rem' },
+               fontWeight: 600,
+               lineHeight: 1.2,
+             }}
+           >
+             {title}
+           </Typography>
+         }
+         subheader={
+           subtitle && (
+             <Typography
+               variant="subtitle2"
+               color="text.secondary"
+               sx={{
+                 fontSize: { xs: '0.75rem', sm: '0.8rem', md: '0.875rem' },
+               }}
+             >
+               {subtitle}
+             </Typography>
+           )
+         }
+         avatar={icon}
+         action={
+           onMoreClick ? (
+             <IconButton aria-label="more options" onClick={onMoreClick}>
+               <MoreVertIcon />
+             </IconButton>
+           ) : null
+         }
+         sx={{
+           pb: 0,
+           ...getPadding(),
+         }}
+       />
+ 
+       {/* Media Section */}
+       {mediaUrl && (
+         <CardMedia
+           component="img"
+           height={isMobile ? mediaHeight * 0.75 : mediaHeight}
+           image={mediaUrl}
+           alt={mediaTitle || title}
+           sx={{ p: 1 }}
+         />
+       )}
+ 
+       {/* Content */}
+       <CardContent sx={{ ...getPadding(), pt: 1, flexGrow: 1 }}>
+         {content}
+       </CardContent>
+ 
+       {/* Actions and Expandable Section */}
+       {(action || expandableContent) && (
+         <>
+           <CardActions
+             sx={{
+               display: 'flex',
+               justifyContent: action && expandableContent ? 'space-between' : 'flex-end',
+               px: getPadding().p,
+               py: 1,
+             }}
+           >
+             {action}
+             {expandableContent && (
+               <IconButton onClick={handleExpandClick} aria-expanded={expanded} aria-label="show more">
+                 {expanded ? <ExpandLessIcon /> : <ExpandMoreIcon />}
+               </IconButton>
+             )}
+           </CardActions>
+ 
+           {/* Expandable Content */}
+           {expandableContent && (
+             <Collapse in={expanded} timeout="auto" unmountOnExit>
+               <Divider sx={{ mx: 2 }} />
+               <CardContent sx={{ ...getPadding() }}>{expandableContent}</CardContent>
+             </Collapse>
+           )}
+         </>
+       )}
+     </Card>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default ResponsiveCard;
```

```diff
+ // <copyright file="LazyLoadWrapper.tsx" company="ResidenceManager">

+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Lazy loading iÃ§in wrapper bileÅŸeni
+ // Dependencies: React
+ // Usage: Kod bÃ¶lme ve geÃ§ yÃ¼kleme iÃ§in kullanÄ±lÄ±r
+ // Author: Claude

+ 
+ import React, { Suspense, ReactNode, LazyExoticComponent } from 'react';
+ import { Box, CircularProgress, Typography, useTheme } from '@mui/material';
+ 
+ interface LazyLoadWrapperProps {
+   children: ReactNode;
+   fallback?: ReactNode;
+   minHeight?: string | number;
+ }
+ 
+ interface LazyComponentProps {
+   component: LazyExoticComponent<React.ComponentType<any>>;
+   props?: Record<string, any>;
+   fallback?: ReactNode;
+   minHeight?: string | number;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Default fallback component for lazy loading
+  */
+ const DefaultLoadingFallback: React.FC<{ minHeight?: string | number }> = ({ minHeight = '70vh' }) => {
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   
+   return (
+     <Box
+       sx={{
+         display: 'flex',
+         flexDirection: 'column',
+         alignItems: 'center',
+         justifyContent: 'center',
+         minHeight: minHeight,
+       }}
+     >
+       <CircularProgress color="primary" size={40} thickness={4} />
+       <Typography
+         variant="body1"
+         color="text.secondary"
+         sx={{ mt: 2 }}
+       >
+         YÃ¼kleniyor...
+       </Typography>
+     </Box>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * LazyLoadWrapper - Suspense ile sarmalanmÄ±ÅŸ bileÅŸenlerin yÃ¼klenmesini yÃ¶netir
+  */
+ export const LazyLoadWrapper: React.FC<LazyLoadWrapperProps> = ({
+   children,
+   fallback,
+   minHeight = '70vh',
+ }) => {
+   return (
+     <Suspense fallback={fallback || <DefaultLoadingFallback minHeight={minHeight} />}>
+       {children}
+     </Suspense>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * LazyComponent - Lazy loaded bileÅŸenler iÃ§in yardÄ±mcÄ± komponent
+  */
+ export const LazyComponent: React.FC<LazyComponentProps> = ({
+   component: Component,
+   props = {},
+   fallback,
+   minHeight = '70vh',
+ }) => {
+   return (
+     <LazyLoadWrapper fallback={fallback} minHeight={minHeight}>
+       <Component {...props} />
+     </LazyLoadWrapper>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * createLazyComponent - Dynamic import ile lazy component oluÅŸturmak iÃ§in yardÄ±mcÄ± fonksiyon
+  * @param importFunc Dynamic import fonksiyonu
+  * @returns Lazy component
+  */
+ export function createLazyComponent<T extends React.ComponentType<any>>(
+   importFunc: () => Promise<{ default: T }>
+ ): LazyExoticComponent<T> {
+   return React.lazy(importFunc);
+ }
+ 
+ export default {
+   LazyLoadWrapper,
+   LazyComponent,
+   createLazyComponent,
+ };
```

```diff

+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="MemoComponent.tsx" company="ResidenceManager">
+ // Copyright (c) ResidenceManager. All rights reserved.
+ // </copyright>
+ // -----
+ // Purpose: React.memo kullanarak gereksiz render'larÄ± Ã¶nleyen bileÅŸen
+ // Dependencies: React
+ // Usage: Performans optimizasyonu iÃ§in bileÅŸenleri memo ile sarmalamak
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-18
+ // Modified: 2023-07-18
+ // -----
+ 
+ import React, { ComponentType, memo } from 'react';
+ 
+ /**
+  * Ã–zel prop eÅŸitlik kontrolÃ¼ iÃ§in tip tanÄ±mÄ±
+  */
+ type EqualityFn<P> = (prevProps: Readonly<P>, nextProps: Readonly<P>) => boolean;
+ 
+ /**
+  * Component'i React.memo ile sarmalayan helper fonksiyon
+  * @param Component Memoize edilecek komponent
+  * @param propsAreEqual Ã–zel eÅŸitlik kontrolÃ¼ fonksiyonu (opsiyonel)
+  * @returns Memoize edilmiÅŸ komponent
+  */
+ export function memoize<P extends object>(
+   Component: ComponentType<P>,
+   propsAreEqual?: EqualityFn<P>
+ ): React.MemoExoticComponent<ComponentType<P>> {
+   return memo(Component, propsAreEqual);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * BileÅŸen prop'larÄ±nÄ±n derin karÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rmasÄ±nÄ± yapar
+  * @param prevProps Ã–nceki prop'lar
+  * @param nextProps Yeni prop'lar
+  * @returns Prop'larÄ±n eÅŸit olup olmadÄ±ÄŸÄ±
+  */
+ export function deepPropsComparison<P extends object>(
+   prevProps: Readonly<P>,
+   nextProps: Readonly<P>
+ ): boolean {
+   function isEqual(obj1: any, obj2: any): boolean {
+     if (obj1 === obj2) return true;
+     
+     // Null/undefined kontrolÃ¼
+     if (obj1 == null || obj2 == null) return obj1 === obj2;
+     
+     // Tip kontrolÃ¼
+     if (typeof obj1 !== typeof obj2) return false;
+     
+     // Primitive deÄŸerler iÃ§in
+     if (typeof obj1 !== 'object') return obj1 === obj2;
+     
+     // Array kontrolÃ¼
+     if (Array.isArray(obj1) && Array.isArray(obj2)) {
+       if (obj1.length !== obj2.length) return false;
+       
+       for (let i = 0; i < obj1.length; i++) {
+         if (!isEqual(obj1[i], obj2[i])) return false;
+       }
+       
+       return true;
+     }
+     
+     // Object kontrolÃ¼
+     if (Array.isArray(obj1) !== Array.isArray(obj2)) return false;
+     
+     const keys1 = Object.keys(obj1);
+     const keys2 = Object.keys(obj2);
+     
+     if (keys1.length !== keys2.length) return false;
+     
+     return keys1.every(key => 
+       Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(obj2, key) && 
+       isEqual(obj1[key], obj2[key])
+     );
+   }
+   
+   return isEqual(prevProps, nextProps);
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Belirli prop'larÄ± hariÃ§ tutarak karÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rma yapan fonksiyon
+  * @param excludeProps KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rmadan hariÃ§ tutulacak prop isimleri
+  * @returns KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rma fonksiyonu
+  */
+ export function propsComparisonExcept<P extends object>(
+   excludeProps: (keyof P)[]
+ ): EqualityFn<P> {
+   return (prevProps, nextProps) => {
+     const relevantPrevProps: Partial<P> = {};
+     const relevantNextProps: Partial<P> = {};
+     
+     Object.keys(prevProps).forEach(key => {
+       if (!excludeProps.includes(key as keyof P)) {
+         relevantPrevProps[key as keyof P] = prevProps[key as keyof P];
+       }
+     });
+     
+     Object.keys(nextProps).forEach(key => {
+       if (!excludeProps.includes(key as keyof P)) {
+         relevantNextProps[key as keyof P] = nextProps[key as keyof P];
+       }
+     });
+     
+     return deepPropsComparison(relevantPrevProps as P, relevantNextProps as P);
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Sadece belirli prop'lar deÄŸiÅŸtiÄŸinde render yapan karÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rma fonksiyonu
+  * @param includeProps Sadece bu prop'lar karÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rÄ±lacak
+  * @returns KarÅŸÄ±laÅŸtÄ±rma fonksiyonu
+  */
+ export function propsComparisonOnly<P extends object>(
+   includeProps: (keyof P)[]
+ ): EqualityFn<P> {
+   return (prevProps, nextProps) => {
+     for (const prop of includeProps) {
+       if (!deepPropsComparison(prevProps[prop], nextProps[prop])) {
+         return false;
+       }
+     }
+     return true;
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * MemoComponent - Bir bileÅŸeni React.memo ile sarmalar
+  */
+ const MemoComponent = {
+   memoize,
+   deepPropsComparison,
+   propsComparisonExcept,
+   propsComparisonOnly,
+ };
+ 
+ export default MemoComponent;
```

```diff
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="performance.ts" company="ResidenceManager">

+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Performans izleme ve Ã¶lÃ§me araÃ§larÄ±
+ // Dependencies: Web APIs
+ // Usage: Uygulama performansÄ±nÄ± izleme, Ã¶lÃ§me ve raporlama
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-18
+ // Modified: 2023-07-18
+ // -----
+ 
+ /**
+  * Uygulama performansÄ± ile ilgili metrikleri takip eder
+  */
+ export interface PerformanceMetrics {
+   timeToFirstByte?: number;
+   loadTime?: number;
+   domContentLoaded?: number;
+   firstPaint?: number;
+   firstContentfulPaint?: number;
+   largestContentfulPaint?: number;
+   timeToInteractive?: number;
+   totalBlockingTime?: number;
+   cumulativeLayoutShift?: number;
+   firstInputDelay?: number;
+   resourceLoadTimes?: Record<string, number>;
+   memoryUsage?: {
+     jsHeapSizeLimit: number;
+     totalJSHeapSize: number;
+     usedJSHeapSize: number;
+   };
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * Performance API kullanÄ±labilir mi diye kontrol eder
+  */
+ export const isPerformanceSupported = (): boolean => {
+   return typeof window !== 'undefined' && 
+          window.performance !== undefined && 
+          window.performance.timing !== undefined;
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Web Vitals deÄŸerlerini Ã¶lÃ§er ve raporlar
+  */
+ export const measureWebVitals = (): Promise<Partial<PerformanceMetrics>> => {
+   return new Promise((resolve) => {
+     if (!isPerformanceSupported()) {
+       resolve({});
+       return;
+     }
+     
+     // Sayfa yÃ¼klendikten sonra Ã¶lÃ§Ã¼mleri yapacaÄŸÄ±z
+     window.addEventListener('load', () => {
+       // Biraz bekleyerek tÃ¼m metriklerin Ã¶lÃ§Ã¼lmesini saÄŸlÄ±yoruz
+       setTimeout(() => {
+         const metrics: Partial<PerformanceMetrics> = {};
+         const perfEntries = window.performance.getEntriesByType('navigation');
+         
+         if (perfEntries.length > 0 && perfEntries[0] instanceof PerformanceNavigationTiming) {
+           const navigationEntry = perfEntries[0] as PerformanceNavigationTiming;
+           
+           metrics.timeToFirstByte = navigationEntry.responseStart;
+           metrics.loadTime = navigationEntry.loadEventEnd - navigationEntry.startTime;
+           metrics.domContentLoaded = navigationEntry.domContentLoadedEventEnd - navigationEntry.startTime;
+         }
+         
+         // First Paint ve First Contentful Paint
+         const paintEntries = window.performance.getEntriesByType('paint');
+         
+         paintEntries.forEach((entry) => {
+           if (entry.name === 'first-paint') {
+             metrics.firstPaint = entry.startTime;
+           } else if (entry.name === 'first-contentful-paint') {
+             metrics.firstContentfulPaint = entry.startTime;
+           }
+         });
+         
+         // Resource metriklerini toplama
+         const resourceEntries = window.performance.getEntriesByType('resource');
+         const resourceLoadTimes: Record<string, number> = {};
+         
+         resourceEntries.forEach((entry) => {
+           const url = entry.name.split('/').pop() || entry.name;
+           resourceLoadTimes[url] = entry.duration;
+         });
+         
+         metrics.resourceLoadTimes = resourceLoadTimes;
+         
+         // Bellek kullanÄ±mÄ± (Chrome'da kullanÄ±labilir)
+         if (window.performance.memory) {
+           metrics.memoryUsage = {
+             jsHeapSizeLimit: window.performance.memory.jsHeapSizeLimit,
+             totalJSHeapSize: window.performance.memory.totalJSHeapSize,
+             usedJSHeapSize: window.performance.memory.usedJSHeapSize,
+           };
+         }
+         
+         resolve(metrics);
+       }, 500);
+     });
+   });
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Fonksiyon Ã§alÄ±ÅŸma sÃ¼resini Ã¶lÃ§er
+  * @param fn Ã–lÃ§Ã¼lecek fonksiyon
+  * @param args Fonksiyon argÃ¼manlarÄ±
+  * @returns Fonksiyon sonucu ve Ã§alÄ±ÅŸma sÃ¼resi
+  */
+ export const measureFunctionExecutionTime = <T extends any[], R>(
+   fn: (...args: T) => R,
+   ...args: T
+ ): { result: R; executionTime: number } => {
+   const startTime = performance.now();
+   const result = fn(...args);
+   const endTime = performance.now();
+   
+   return {
+     result,
+     executionTime: endTime - startTime,
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * React bileÅŸeni render sÃ¼resini Ã¶lÃ§er
+  * @param componentName BileÅŸen adÄ±
+  * @returns Start ve stop fonksiyonlarÄ±
+  */
+ export const measureComponentRenderTime = (componentName: string) => {
+   const markStart = `${componentName}_render_start`;
+   const markEnd = `${componentName}_render_end`;
+   
+   return {
+     start: () => {
+       if (isPerformanceSupported()) {
+         performance.mark(markStart);
+       }
+     },
+     stop: (): number | undefined => {
+       if (isPerformanceSupported()) {
+         performance.mark(markEnd);
+         performance.measure(
+           `${componentName}_render_duration`,
+           markStart,
+           markEnd
+         );
+         
+         const measures = performance.getEntriesByName(
+           `${componentName}_render_duration`
+         );
+         
+         if (measures.length > 0) {
+           return measures[0].duration;
+         }
+       }
+       
+       return undefined;
+     },
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Performans verilerini loglama
+  * @param metricName Metrik adÄ±
+  * @param value Metrik deÄŸeri
+  */
+ export const logPerformanceMetric = (metricName: string, value: number): void => {
+   console.log(`[Performance] ${metricName}: ${value.toFixed(2)}ms`);
+   
+   // Burada ayrÄ±ca analytics servisine de gÃ¶nderebiliriz
+   // sendToAnalyticsService(metricName, value);
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Slow render'larÄ± tespit etmek iÃ§in bir HOC
+  * @param threshold EÅŸik deÄŸer (ms)
+  * @returns Higher-Order Component
+  */
+ export const detectSlowRenders = (threshold: number = 16) => {
+   return <P extends object>(Component: React.ComponentType<P>) => {
+     const ComponentName = Component.displayName || Component.name || 'Component';
+     
+     const WrappedComponent: React.FC<P> = (props) => {
+       React.useEffect(() => {
+         const measure = measureComponentRenderTime(ComponentName);
+         measure.start();
+         
+         return () => {
+           const duration = measure.stop();
+           if (duration && duration > threshold) {
+             console.warn(
+               `[SlowRender] ${ComponentName} took ${duration.toFixed(2)}ms to render (threshold: ${threshold}ms)`
+             );
+           }
+         };
+       }, []);
+       
+       return <Component {...props} />;
+     };
+     
+     WrappedComponent.displayName = `DetectSlowRenders(${ComponentName})`;
+     
+     return WrappedComponent;
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ /**
+  * Performance monitor hook
+  * @returns Performance metrikleri ve Ã¶lÃ§Ã¼m fonksiyonlarÄ±
+  */
+ export const usePerformanceMonitor = () => {
+   const [metrics, setMetrics] = React.useState<Partial<PerformanceMetrics>>({});
+   
+   const collectMetrics = React.useCallback(async () => {
+     const newMetrics = await measureWebVitals();
+     setMetrics(newMetrics);
+   }, []);
+   
+   React.useEffect(() => {
+     collectMetrics();
+   }, [collectMetrics]);
+   
+   return {
+     metrics,
+     refreshMetrics: collectMetrics,
+     measureFunction: measureFunctionExecutionTime,
+     detectSlowRenders,
+   };
+ };
+ 
+ export default {
+   measureWebVitals,
+   measureFunctionExecutionTime,
+   measureComponentRenderTime,
+   logPerformanceMetric,
+   detectSlowRenders,
+   usePerformanceMonitor,
+   isPerformanceSupported,
+ };
```

```diff
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="OptimizedImage.tsx" company="ResidenceManager">

+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Optimize edilmiÅŸ gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ bileÅŸeni
+ // Dependencies: React, IntersectionObserver API
+ // Usage: GÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼leri lazy loading ve responsive Ã¶zellikleriyle optimize eder
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-18
+ // Modified: 2023-07-18
+ // -----
+ 
+ import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef, ImgHTMLAttributes } from 'react';
+ import { Box, Skeleton, useTheme } from '@mui/material';
+ import { SxProps } from '@mui/system';
+ 
+ interface OptimizedImageProps extends Omit<ImgHTMLAttributes<HTMLImageElement>, 'src'> {
+   src: string;
+   fallbackSrc?: string;
+   webpSrc?: string;
+   placeholderSrc?: string;
+   alt: string;
+   width?: number | string;
+   height?: number | string;
+   aspectRatio?: number;
+   lazy?: boolean;
+   threshold?: number;
+   loadingComponent?: React.ReactNode;
+   errorComponent?: React.ReactNode;
+   imgSx?: SxProps;
+   containerSx?: SxProps;
+   sizes?: string;
+   srcSet?: string;
+   webpSrcSet?: string;
+   onLoad?: () => void;
+   onError?: () => void;
+   blur?: boolean;
+   blurAmount?: number;
+ }
+ 
+ /**
+  * OptimizedImage component with lazy loading, WebP support, placeholder and error fallbacks
+  */
+ const OptimizedImage: React.FC<OptimizedImageProps> = ({
+   src,
+   fallbackSrc,
+   webpSrc,
+   placeholderSrc,
+   alt,
+   width,
+   height,
+   aspectRatio,
+   lazy = true,
+   threshold = 0.1,
+   loadingComponent,
+   errorComponent,
+   imgSx,
+   containerSx,
+   sizes,
+   srcSet,
+   webpSrcSet,
+   onLoad,
+   onError,
+   blur = false,
+   blurAmount = 5,
+   ...props
+ }) => {
+   const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false);
+   const [isError, setIsError] = useState(false);
+   const [shouldLoad, setShouldLoad] = useState(!lazy);
+   const imgRef = useRef<HTMLImageElement>(null);
+   const theme = useTheme();
+   
+   // Check if browser supports WebP format
+   const [supportsWebP, setSupportsWebP] = useState(false);
+   
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const checkWebPSupport = async () => {
+       try {
+         const webPCheck = document.createElement('canvas');
+         if (webPCheck.getContext && webPCheck.getContext('2d')) {
+           const canvasContext = webPCheck.getContext('2d')!;
+           const result = canvasContext.fillText('webp test', 0, 0);
+           const blob = await new Promise<Blob | null>((resolve) => {
+             webPCheck.toBlob((b) => resolve(b), 'image/webp');
+           });
+           setSupportsWebP(blob !== null);
+         } else {
+           setSupportsWebP(false);
+         }
+       } catch (e) {
+         setSupportsWebP(false);
+       }
+     };
+     
+     checkWebPSupport();
+   }, []);
+   
+   useEffect(() => {
+     if (!lazy || !window.IntersectionObserver) {
+       setShouldLoad(true);
+       return;
+     }
+     
+     const observer = new IntersectionObserver(
+       (entries) => {
+         entries.forEach((entry) => {
+           if (entry.isIntersecting) {
+             setShouldLoad(true);
+             observer.disconnect();
+           }
+         });
+       },
+       { threshold }
+     );
+     
+     if (imgRef.current) {
+       observer.observe(imgRef.current);
+     }
+     
+     return () => {
+       observer.disconnect();
+     };
+   }, [lazy, threshold]);
+   
+   const handleLoad = () => {
+     setIsLoaded(true);
+     onLoad?.();
+   };
+   
+   const handleError = () => {
+     if (!fallbackSrc) {
+       setIsError(true);
+     }
+     onError?.();
+   };
+   
+   // Calculate aspect ratio styles
+   const getAspectRatioStyles = () => {
+     if (aspectRatio) {
+       return {
+         position: 'relative',
+         paddingTop: `${(1 / aspectRatio) * 100}%`,
+       };
+     }
+     return {};
+   };
+   
+   // Render loading component
+   const renderLoading = () => {
+     if (loadingComponent) {
+       return loadingComponent;
+     }
+     return (
+       <Skeleton
+         variant="rectangular"
+         width="100%"
+         height="100%"
+         animation="wave"
+         sx={{
+           position: aspectRatio ? 'absolute' : 'relative',
+           top: 0,
+           left: 0,
+           right: 0,
+           bottom: 0,
+         }}
+       />
+     );
+   };
+   
+   // Render error component
+   const renderError = () => {
+     if (errorComponent) {
+       return errorComponent;
+     }
+     return (
+       <Box
+         sx={{
+           width: '100%',
+           height: '100%',
+           display: 'flex',
+           alignItems: 'center',
+           justifyContent: 'center',
+           backgroundColor: 'grey.200',
+           color: 'text.secondary',
+           position: aspectRatio ? 'absolute' : 'relative',
+           top: 0,
+           left: 0,
+           right: 0,
+           bottom: 0,
+           fontSize: '0.875rem',
+         }}
+       >
+         GÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ yÃ¼klenemedi
+       </Box>
+     );
+   };
+   
+   // Get appropriate image source
+   const getImageSrc = () => {
+     if (isError && fallbackSrc) {
+       return fallbackSrc;
+     }
+     
+     if (!shouldLoad && placeholderSrc) {
+       return placeholderSrc;
+     }
+     
+     return supportsWebP && webpSrc ? webpSrc : src;
+   };
+   
+   return (
+     <Box
+       sx={{
+         width,
+         height,
+         overflow: 'hidden',
+         ...getAspectRatioStyles(),
+         ...containerSx,
+       }}
+     >
+       {!isLoaded && !isError && renderLoading()}
+       {isError && !fallbackSrc && renderError()}
+       
+       {(shouldLoad || placeholderSrc) && (
+         <>
+           {supportsWebP && webpSrc && (
+             <picture>
+               <source 
+                 type="image/webp" 
+                 srcSet={webpSrcSet || webpSrc}
+                 sizes={sizes} 
+               />
+               <source 
+                 type="image/jpeg" 
+                 srcSet={srcSet || src}
+                 sizes={sizes} 
+               />
+               <img
+                 ref={imgRef}
+                 src={getImageSrc()}
+                 alt={alt}
+                 onLoad={handleLoad}
+                 onError={handleError}
+                 width={width}
+                 height={height}
+                 sizes={sizes}
+                 style={{
+                   objectFit: 'cover',
+                   width: '100%',
+                   height: '100%',
+                   position: aspectRatio ? 'absolute' : 'relative',
+                   top: 0,
+                   left: 0,
+                   opacity: isLoaded ? 1 : 0,
+                   transition: 'opacity 0.3s ease-in-out',
+                   filter: blur && !isLoaded ? `blur(${blurAmount}px)` : 'none',
+                   ...(imgSx as any),
+                 }}
+                 {...props}
+               />
+             </picture>
+           )}
+           
+           {(!supportsWebP || !webpSrc) && (
+             <img
+               ref={imgRef}
+               src={getImageSrc()}
+               alt={alt}
+               onLoad={handleLoad}
+               onError={handleError}
+               width={width}
+               height={height}
+               sizes={sizes}
+               srcSet={srcSet}
+               style={{
+                 objectFit: 'cover',
+                 width: '100%',
+                 height: '100%',
+                 position: aspectRatio ? 'absolute' : 'relative',
+                 top: 0,
+                 left: 0,
+                 opacity: isLoaded ? 1 : 0,
+                 transition: 'opacity 0.3s ease-in-out',
+                 filter: blur && !isLoaded ? `blur(${blurAmount}px)` : 'none',
+                 ...(imgSx as any),
+               }}
+               {...props}
+             />
+           )}
+         </>
+       )}
+     </Box>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default OptimizedImage;
```

Based on the analysis, here are the technical issues I've identified in the project:

## 1. Missing Dependencies

Several important libraries used in components are not properly installed in the project:

1. **@mui/x-data-grid**: Used in Announcements.tsx but missing from package.json
   ```typescript
   import { DataGrid, GridColDef, GridToolbar } from '@mui/x-data-grid';
   ```

2. **@mui/x-date-pickers**: Used for date/time picking in Announcements.tsx
   ```typescript
   import { DateTimePicker } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/DateTimePicker';
   import { LocalizationProvider } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/LocalizationProvider';
   import { AdapterDateFns } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/AdapterDateFns';
   ```

3. **notistack**: Used for snackbar notifications in multiple components
   ```typescript
   import { useSnackbar } from 'notistack';
   ```

4. **Version mismatch**: Project uses both React Query and Tanstack Query
   ```typescript
   // In components:
   import { useQuery, useMutation } from 'react-query';
   
   // In package.json:
   "@tanstack/react-query": "^4.36.1",
   ```

## 2. Missing Type Definitions

Multiple components have TypeScript errors due to implicit any types:

```typescript
// In Announcements.tsx
renderCell: (params) => { // Parameter 'params' implicitly has an 'any' type
  const priority = params.value as string;
  // ...
}
```

## 3. Non-existent API Services and Hooks

Components are importing from files that don't exist in the project:

1. **Missing API service**:
   ```typescript
   import { announcementService } from '../../../api/announcementService';
   ```
   But the only file in the api directory is `axiosConfig.ts`

2. **Missing hook**:
   ```typescript
   import { useAuth } from '../../../hooks/useAuth';
   ```
   But this file doesn't exist in the hooks directory

## 4. Inconsistent Component Structure

There's inconsistent structure in the components:

1. Both functional components and React.FC typing are mixed throughout the codebase
2. Some components have proper type definitions while others use implicit typing

## 5. Path Alias Configuration vs Actual Usage

The tsconfig.json has path aliases configured:

```json
"paths": {
  "@/*": ["*"],
  "@components/*": ["components/*"],
  // ...many others
}
```

But components are using relative imports instead:

```typescript
import { useAuth } from '../../../hooks/useAuth';
```

## 6. Styling Inconsistencies

The theme.ts file includes responsive styles for MuiDataGrid, but this component isn't available without the missing @mui/x-data-grid package.

## 7. Mock Data Usage

Components are using hard-coded mock data instead of real API calls, despite having API implementation imports:

```typescript
const MOCK_ANNOUNCEMENTS: Announcement[] = [
  // ...
];
```

This suggests the frontend is in development and not yet properly integrated with the backend.

## 8. Type Safety Issues

Missing proper TypeScript type safety in several areas:

```typescript
color={color as any} // Using 'any' type cast

// Function parameters without type definitions
onChange={(newValue) => field.onChange(newValue)} // Parameter 'newValue' implicitly has an 'any' type
```

## Recommendations:

1. **Install missing dependencies**:
   ```bash
   npm install @mui/x-data-grid @mui/x-date-pickers notistack date-fns
   ```

2. **Standardize API usage**:
   - Migrate all React Query imports to use @tanstack/react-query
   - Create missing API services like announcementService.ts

3. **Fix type definitions**:
   - Add proper type interfaces for all function parameters
   - Use consistent component typing (React.FC or function components)

4. **Use path aliases**:
   - Replace relative imports with configured path aliases 
   - Example: `import { useAuth } from '@hooks/useAuth';`

5. **Add missing hooks and services**:
   - Create the useAuth hook in the hooks directory
   - Add proper API services for data fetching

6. **Fix linting and compiler errors**:
   - Run `npm run lint:fix` to fix automated issues
   - Address remaining TypeScript errors manually

7. **Implement proper error handling**:
   - Add error states for API calls
   - Implement proper loading indicators

These changes will significantly improve the technical coherence and stability of the codebase.

```diff
+ // -----
+ // <copyright file="useAuth.ts" company="ResidenceManager">

+ // -----
+ // Purpose: Kimlik doÄŸrulama ve yetkilendirme yÃ¶netimi iÃ§in hook
+ // Dependencies: React, React Context, Axios
+ // Usage: KullanÄ±cÄ± giriÅŸi, Ã§Ä±kÄ±ÅŸÄ± ve yetki kontrolÃ¼ iÃ§in kullanÄ±lÄ±r
+ // Author: Claude
+ // Created: 2023-07-25
+ // Modified: 2023-07-25
+ // -----
+ 
+ import { useContext, createContext, useState, useEffect, ReactNode } from 'react';
+ import axios from '../api/axiosConfig';
+ 
+ // KullanÄ±cÄ± tÃ¼rÃ¼
+ interface User {
+   id: number;
+   email: string;
+   firstName: string;
+   lastName: string;
+   role: string;
+   permissions: string[];
+   companyId?: number;
+   branchId?: number;
+   avatar?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ // GiriÅŸ istekleri iÃ§in arayÃ¼z
+ interface LoginRequest {
+   email: string;
+   password: string;
+   rememberMe?: boolean;
+ }
+ 
+ // Kimlik doÄŸrulama sonucu
+ interface AuthResponse {
+   user: User;
+   token: string;
+   refreshToken: string;
+ }
+ 
+ // Kimlik baÄŸlamÄ± tipi
+ interface AuthContextType {
+   user: User | null;
+   isAuthenticated: boolean;
+   isLoading: boolean;
+   error: string | null;
+   login: (credentials: LoginRequest) => Promise<boolean>;
+   logout: () => void;
+   hasPermission: (permission: string) => boolean;
+   updateUser: (userData: Partial<User>) => void;
+   token: string | null;
+ }
+ 
+ // Kimlik doÄŸrulama baÄŸlamÄ± oluÅŸturma
+ const AuthContext = createContext<AuthContextType | undefined>(undefined);
+ 
+ // Yerel depolamadan token ve kullanÄ±cÄ±yÄ± al
+ const getStoredAuth = (): { token: string | null; user: User | null } => {
+   if (typeof window === 'undefined') {
+     return { token: null, user: null };
+   }
+   
+   try {
+     const token = localStorage.getItem('auth_token');
+     const userStr = localStorage.getItem('auth_user');
+     const user = userStr ? JSON.parse(userStr) : null;
+     
+     return { token, user };
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Failed to retrieve auth from storage', error);
+     return { token: null, user: null };
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // Kimlik doÄŸrulama saÄŸlayÄ±cÄ±sÄ± bileÅŸeni
+ export const AuthProvider = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => {
+   const [user, setUser] = useState<User | null>(null);
+   const [token, setToken] = useState<string | null>(null);
+   const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
+   const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
+   
+   // BileÅŸen yÃ¼klendiÄŸinde yerel depolamadan kimlik bilgilerini al
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const { token, user } = getStoredAuth();
+     
+     if (token && user) {
+       setToken(token);
+       setUser(user);
+       // Auth header'a token'Ä± ayarla
+       axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`;
+     }
+     
+     setIsLoading(false);
+   }, []);
+   
+   // GiriÅŸ fonksiyonu
+   const login = async (credentials: LoginRequest): Promise<boolean> => {
+     setIsLoading(true);
+     setError(null);
+     
+     try {
+       const response = await axios.post<AuthResponse>('/api/auth/login', credentials);
+       const { user, token, refreshToken } = response.data;
+       
+       // Yerel depolamaya kaydet
+       localStorage.setItem('auth_token', token);
+       localStorage.setItem('auth_refresh_token', refreshToken);
+       localStorage.setItem('auth_user', JSON.stringify(user));
+       
+       // State gÃ¼ncelle
+       setUser(user);
+       setToken(token);
+       
+       // HTTP istekleri iÃ§in Authorization header'Ä±nÄ± ayarla
+       axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = `Bearer ${token}`;
+       
+       setIsLoading(false);
+       return true;
+     } catch (err: any) {
+       const errorMessage = err.response?.data?.message || 'GiriÅŸ yapÄ±lamadÄ±';
+       setError(errorMessage);
+       setIsLoading(false);
+       return false;
+     }
+   };
+   
+   // Ã‡Ä±kÄ±ÅŸ fonksiyonu
+   const logout = () => {
+     // Yerel depolamadan kaldÄ±r
+     localStorage.removeItem('auth_token');
+     localStorage.removeItem('auth_refresh_token');
+     localStorage.removeItem('auth_user');
+     
+     // State temizle
+     setUser(null);
+     setToken(null);
+     
+     // HTTP Authorization header'Ä±nÄ± temizle
+     delete axios.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'];
+   };
+   
+   // Yetki kontrolÃ¼
+   const hasPermission = (permission: string): boolean => {
+     if (!user) return false;
+     
+     // 'admin' rolÃ¼ tÃ¼m izinlere sahiptir
+     if (user.role === 'admin') return true;
+     
+     return user.permissions.includes(permission);
+   };
+   
+   // KullanÄ±cÄ± bilgilerini gÃ¼ncelleme
+   const updateUser = (userData: Partial<User>) => {
+     if (!user) return;
+     
+     const updatedUser = { ...user, ...userData };
+     setUser(updatedUser);
+     localStorage.setItem('auth_user', JSON.stringify(updatedUser));
+   };
+   
+   // DeÄŸerleri baÄŸlama saÄŸla
+   const value = {
+     user,
+     isAuthenticated: !!user,
+     isLoading,
+     error,
+     login,
+     logout,
+     hasPermission,
+     updateUser,
+     token,
+   };
+   
+   return <AuthContext.Provider value={value}>{children}</AuthContext.Provider>;
+ };
+ 
+ // useAuth hook
+ export const useAuth = (): AuthContextType => {
+   const context = useContext(AuthContext);
+   
+   if (context === undefined) {
+     throw new Error('useAuth must be used within an AuthProvider');
+   }
+   
+   return context;
+ };
```

The FormField component is being used in many places throughout the application, but we don't need to update each one because the FormFieldController component is being used, which will handle the correct type conversions based on our recent updates.

Let's summarize the technical changes we've made to fix the issues:

1. Updated FormField.tsx component:
   - Added a dedicated type for the onChange handler (FormFieldChangeHandler)
   - Changed 'any' to more specific types
   - Fixed value and onChange prop types
   - Improved proper type casting in the component rendering

2. Updated FormFieldController.tsx:
   - Improved type safety for controller props
   - Added proper type handling for both input and select events
   - Implemented a handler that correctly converts events for React Hook Form

3. Fixed index.ts exports:
   - Properly exported types and components with correct TypeScript syntax
   - Used 'export type' for type exports to satisfy isolatedModules

4. Updated FormFieldDemo.tsx:
   - Created separate handlers for different form field types
   - Implemented a single handler that properly detects and routes events
   - Removed type casting (as any) that could cause errors
   - Applied multiline and rows properties directly to FormField

These changes ensure type safety throughout the FormField component system, making it more robust and less prone to runtime errors. The components should now correctly handle different input types and form controls without TypeScript errors.
